summary: I use KDE Plasma 6 as my desktop environment.  Among my petty grievances is the fact that KDE does not provide a way to automatically switch themes.  In my case, I like to use a light theme during the day, and a dark theme as soon as the sun sets...
title: Automatic KDE Theme switching using systemd

summary: I recently spun up my own Bluesky PDS server on Coolify.  It's fairly easy compared to all the documentation Bluesky put out.  It's also a lot less than you would have ever imagined...
title: Hosting Bluesky with Coolify

summary: HashiTalks returns on February 20, 2025.  Join our global community for 24-hours of knowledge sharing.  The call for proposals is open through December 1, 2024
title: HashiTalks 2025: 24-hours of virtual knowledge sharing
